result.ga: Ar bhain tú taitneamh as an oíche
result.orig: Ar bhain tú taitneamh as an oíche
result.html: Ar bhain tú taitneamh as an oícheDid you enjoy the night?
result.ponchtml: Ar ḃain tú taitneaṁ as an oíċeDid you enjoy the night?

result.html: Bhain an madra greim asamThe dog bit me.
result.ponchtml: Ḃain an madra greim asamThe dog bit me.

result.ga: Bhain mé sult as bhur gcuideachta
result.orig: Bhain mé sult as bhur gcuideachta
result.html: Bhain mé sult as bhur gcuideachtaI enjoyed your company.
result.ponchtml: Ḃain mé sult as ḃur gcuideaċtaI enjoyed your company.

result.eng: I have tried the new search engine.
result.ga: Bhain mé triail as an inneall cuardaigh nua
result.orig: Bhain mé triail as an inneall cuardaigh nua
result.html: Bhain mé triail as an inneall cuardaigh nuaI have tried the new search engine.
result.ponchtml: Ḃain mé triail as an inneall cuardaiġ nuaI have tried the new search engine.

result.eng: They took off everything I was wearing.
result.ga: Bhain siad díom a raibh umam
result.orig: Bhain siad díom a raibh umam
result.html: Bhain siad díom a raibh umamThey took off everything I was wearing.
result.ponchtml: Ḃain siad díom a raiḃ umamThey took off everything I was wearing.

result.eng: He took the picture off the wall.
result.ga: Bhain sé an pictiúr den bhalla
result.orig: Bhain sé an pictiúr den bhalla
result.html: Bhain sé an pictiúr den bhallaHe took the picture off the wall.
result.ponchtml: Ḃain sé an pictiúr den ḃallaHe took the picture off the wall.

result.eng: She stretched her limbs and took a deep breath.
result.ga: Bhain sí searradh as a géaga agus tharraing anáil dhomhain
result.orig: Bhain sí searradh as a géaga agus tharraing anáil dhomhain
result.html: Bhain sí searradh as a géaga agus tharraing anáil dhomhainShe stretched her limbs and took a deep breath.
result.ponchtml: Ḃain sí searraḋ as a géaga agus ṫarraing anáil ḋoṁainShe stretched her limbs and took a deep breath.

result.eng: The images startled me with their strange beauty.
result.ga: Bhain na híomhánna bíogadh asam lena gcuid áilleachta aduaine
result.orig: Bhain na híomhánna bíogadh asam lena gcuid áilleachta aduaine
result.html: Bhain na híomhánna bíogadh asam lena gcuid áilleachta aduaineThe images startled me with their strange beauty.
result.ponchtml: Ḃain na híoṁánna bíogaḋ asam lena gcuid áilleaċta aduaineThe images startled me with their strange beauty.

result.eng: In 1856 the United States Supreme Court ruled that the country's bill of rights did not apply to Black people.
result.ga: In 1856 rialaigh Cúirt Uachtarach na Stát Aontaithe nár bhain bille cearta na tíre le daoine Gorma
result.orig: In 1856 rialaigh Cúirt Uachtarach na Stát Aontaithe nár bhain bille cearta na tíre le daoine Gorma
result.html: In 1856 rialaigh Cúirt Uachtarach na Stát Aontaithe nár bhain bille cearta na tíre le daoine GormaIn 1856 the United States Supreme Court ruled that the country's bill of rights did not apply to Black people.
result.ponchtml: In 1856 rialaiġ Cúirt Uaċtaraċ na Stát Aontaiṫe nár ḃain bille cearta na tíre le daoine GormaIn 1856 the United States Supreme Court ruled that the country's bill of rights did not apply to Black people.

result.eng: She grabbed the glass and took a sip from it.
result.ga: Rug sí ar an ghloine agus bhain súimín as
result.orig: Rug sí ar an ghloine agus bhain súimín as
result.html: Rug sí ar an ghloine agus bhain súimín asShe grabbed the glass and took a sip from it.
result.ponchtml: Rug sí ar an ġloine agus ḃain súimín asShe grabbed the glass and took a sip from it.

result.eng: He drank another gulp from it.
result.html: Bhain sé slogóg eile asHe drank another gulp from it.
result.ponchtml: Ḃain sé slogóg eile asHe drank another gulp from it.
